# Qredence Projects

Discover our comprehensive suite of AI reasoning technologies, development frameworks, and enterprise solutions designed to push the boundaries of cognitive computing.

## ğŸ§  AI Reasoning Systems

<CardGroup cols={1}>
  <Card title="Reasoning Kernel" icon="brain" href="/projects/reasoning-kernel/introduction">
    **Advanced AI Reasoning with Model Synthesis Architecture**
    
    Revolutionary AI reasoning system that implements Model Synthesis Architecture (MSA) for human-like cognitive reasoning in novel situations. Features thinking exploration, semantic kernel integration, and persistent memory management.
    
    <div className="flex gap-2 mt-4">
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded text-xs">Python</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-green-100 text-green-800 rounded text-xs">REST API</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 rounded text-xs">Semantic Kernel</div>
      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-red-100 text-red-800 rounded text-xs">Redis</div>
    </div>
    
    **Key Features:**
    - ğŸ§  Model Synthesis Architecture (MSA)
    - ğŸ’¡ Thinking Exploration Framework
    - ğŸ¤– Semantic Kernel Agent Integration
    - ğŸ—„ï¸ Redis Memory Management
    - ğŸ”§ Daytona Sandbox Execution
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Complex decision analysis
    - Scientific hypothesis generation
    - Strategic planning and optimization
    - Novel problem solving
    - Adaptive reasoning in dynamic environments
    
    [Get Started â†’](/projects/reasoning-kernel/quickstart) | [API Docs â†’](/projects/reasoning-kernel/api/overview) | [Examples â†’](/projects/reasoning-kernel/examples/basic-usage)
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

      <div className="px-2 py-1 bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 rounded text-xs">In Development</div>

    </div>

    - Semantic knowledge graphs
    - Automated knowledge extraction
    - Intelligent query processing
    - Multi-modal knowledge integration
    
    **Target Release:** Q3 2024
  </Card>

## ğŸ“Š Project Comparison

<Tabs>
  <Tab title="Feature Matrix">
    | Feature | Reasoning Kernel | Cognitive Framework | Knowledge Graph | Analytics |
    |---------|------------------|-------------------|-----------------|-----------|
    | **Reasoning** | âœ… MSA + Exploration | ğŸ”„ Multi-Agent | ğŸ”„ Semantic | ğŸ”„ Monitoring |
    | **Memory** | âœ… Redis | ğŸ”„ Distributed | âœ… Graph DB | ğŸ”„ Analytics |
    | **APIs** | âœ… REST + Python | ğŸ”„ Multi-Protocol | ğŸ”„ GraphQL | ğŸ”„ REST |
    | **Sandbox** | âœ… Daytona | ğŸ”„ Kubernetes | ğŸ”„ Cloud | ğŸ”„ Embedded |
    | **Enterprise** | ğŸ”„ Beta | ğŸ”„ Planning | ğŸ”„ Planning | ğŸ”„ Built-in |
    
    **Legend:** âœ… Available | ğŸ”„ In Development | âŒ Not Planned
  </Tab>
  
  <Tab title="Use Cases">
    **Reasoning Kernel**
    - Complex decision analysis
    - Novel problem solving
    - Scientific hypothesis generation
    - Strategic planning optimization
    - Adaptive reasoning scenarios
    
    **Cognitive Architecture Framework**
    - Multi-agent simulations
    - Collaborative AI systems
    - Emergent intelligence research
    - Complex system modeling
    - Distributed reasoning networks
    
    **Knowledge Graph Engine**
    - Knowledge base construction
    - Semantic search applications
    - Research data integration
    - Question-answering systems
    - Knowledge discovery workflows
    
    **Reasoning Analytics**
    - Performance optimization
    - Decision audit trails
    - Reasoning process analysis
    - Model performance monitoring
    - Compliance reporting
  </Tab>
  
  <Tab title="Technical Stack">
    **Reasoning Kernel**
    - **Core:** Python 3.12+, Semantic Kernel
    - **Memory:** Redis, Vector Embeddings
    - **Execution:** Daytona Sandbox, Docker
    - **APIs:** REST, Python SDK, WebSocket
    - **AI Models:** Gemini 2.5 Pro, Azure OpenAI
    
    **Cognitive Architecture Framework**
    - **Core:** Python, Rust, Multi-Agent Systems
    - **Communication:** gRPC, Message Queues
    - **Orchestration:** Kubernetes, Service Mesh
    - **Storage:** Distributed Redis, PostgreSQL
    - **Monitoring:** Prometheus, Grafana
    
    **Knowledge Graph Engine**
    - **Core:** Neo4j, Apache Jena, Python
    - **Processing:** Apache Spark, Elasticsearch
    - **APIs:** GraphQL, REST, SPARQL
    - **ML:** PyTorch, Transformers
    - **Storage:** Graph DB, Vector Store
    
    **Reasoning Analytics**
    - **Core:** Python, TypeScript, React
    - **Data:** ClickHouse, PostgreSQL
    - **Visualization:** D3.js, Plotly
    - **APIs:** REST, GraphQL, WebSocket
    - **Deployment:** Kubernetes, Helm
  </Tab>
</Tabs>
